topic.title: Using a console app dbtool for exporting and importing a database

para.text: Using a console app dbtool for exporting and importing a database
In TrackStudio Enterprise 4.0.10 we added a console app

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: export and import database. Now you can get an anonymized backup file without windows graphic environment.
It's very easy to use the application:

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:16px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:#ffffcc; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; padding:8px; border-color:#606060; border-style:single; border-width:1px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: This app uses TrackStudio properties files for database connection parameters. Please, stop TrackStudio Server before use.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:verdana; font-size:10pt; color:#666666;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.19; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#666666; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: line-height:1.00; background-color:#000000; padding:8px; border-color:#cccccc; border-style:single; border-width:2px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Courier New'; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ffffff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Now you got an anonymized export file.
To get export file with real data:

para.style: margin-top:16px; line-height:1.00; background-color:#000000; padding:8px; border-color:#cccccc; border-style:single; border-width:2px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Courier New'; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ffffff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: To import you data into new database:
